text: Dominique Zardi (born Emile Jean Cohen-Zardi) (2 March 1930, Paris – 13 December 2009) was a French actor. He acted in more than 200 feature films, including Fantômas with Louis De Funès and Jean Marais. He died of cancer at the age of 79."Le comédien Dominique Zardi est décédé", L'Express, 16 December 2009.
